00110 #define LOG_MESSAGE(expression, level) \
00111         try { \
00112                 std::ostringstream tmp_log_output_stream;\
00113                 tmp_log_output_stream << expression;\
00114                 log::add_message(tmp_log_output_stream, level);\
00115         }
00116 
00117 #define LOG_FATAL(e) LOG_MESSAGE(e, log::fatal)
00118 #define LOG_ERROR(e) LOG_MESSAGE(e, log::error)
00119 #define LOG_WARNING(e) LOG_MESSAGE(e, log::warning)
00120 #define LOG_INFO(e) LOG_MESSAGE(e, log::info)
00121 #define LOG_MAIN(e) LOG_MESSAGE(e, log::main)
00122 #define LOG_DETAIL(e) LOG_MESSAGE(e, log::detail)
00123 #define LOG_DEBUG(e) LOG_MESSAGE(e, log::debug)
00124 #define LOG_ALL(e) LOG_MESSAGE(e, log::all)
00125 
00126 #endif // include guard
